<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spirit Soother](/Feats.aspx?ID=1371) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are attuned to the minute sounds and sensations of restless spirits. Even if you aren't [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=519), you can attempt a check to find [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) that normally require you to be Searching. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the haunt.
name: Spirit Soother
